DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study characterise pharmacokinetics dose proportionality daptomycin single multiple ( daily ) 4mg/kg 6 mg/kg dos daptomycin healthy Chinese volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Study Daptomycin Healthy Chinese Subjects Living China
DOC.criteria: Men woman ( childbearing potential ) Chinese ethnicity Weight 55Kg 90Kg Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18 25 kg/m2 Have calculate creatinine clearance within range 80 120 ml/min inclusive Unable discontinue use HMGCoA reductase inhibitor therapy within 7 day prior first dose study drug discharge unit CPK > 2X ULN ( upper limit normal )
